Verses: 1 thaaveedhu Nopilirukkira Aasaariyanaakiya Akimelekkinitaththil Ponaan; Akimelekku Natukkaththote Thaaveedhukku Edhirkontupoi: Oruvarum Ummote Kootavaraamal, Neer Ontiyaai Varukiradhu Enna Endru Avanaik Kettaan.

2 thaaveedhu Aasaariyanaakiya Akimelekkaip Paarththu: Raajaa Enakku Oru Kaariyaththaik Kattalaiyittu, Naan Unnai Anuppina Kaariyamum Unakkuk Kattalaiyittadhum Innadhendru Oruvarum Ariyaadhirukkaventum Endru Ennote Sonnaar; Inna Itaththirku Varaventum Endru Sevakarukkuch Cholliyirukkiren.
3 ippodhum Ummutaiya Kaiyil Irukkiradhu Enna? Aindhu Appamaakilum, Ennavaakilum, Irukkiradhai Enkaiyile Kotum Endraan.
4 aasaariyan Thaaveedhukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Parisuththa Appam Irukkiradhe Ozhiya, Saadhaarana Appam En Kaiyil Illai; Vaalipar Sdhireekalotemaaththiram Seraadhirundhaal Kotuppen Endraan.

5 thaaveedhu Aasaariyanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaka: Naan Purappatukiradharku Mun Netrum Mundhaanaalum Sdhireekal Engalukku Vilakkamaayirundhaarkal; Vaaliparutaiya Asampikalum Suththamaayirukkiradhu; Indraiyadhinam Vere Appam Paaththiraththil Piradhishtaipannappattadhinaal, Idhu Saadhaaranamaayitre Endraan.

6 appozhudhu Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Etukkappatta Samukaththappangalaiththavira, Vere Appam Ange Iraadhapatiyinaal Aasaariyan Avanukkup Parisuththa Appaththaik Kotuththaan; Avaikal Etukkappatukira Naalile Adharkup Padhilaakach Chootaana Appam Vaikkappatum.
7 savulutaiya Velaikkaararil Edhomiyanaakiya Thovekku Ennum Perulla Oruvan Andraiyadhinam Ange Karththarutaiya Sannidhiyil Thataipattirundhaan; Avan Savulutaiya Meypparukkuth Thalaivanaayirundhaan.

8 thaaveedhu Akimelekkaip Paarththu: Inge Ummutaiya Vasaththil Oru Eettiyaanaalum Pattayamaanaalum Illaiyaa? Raajaavin Kaariyam Avasaramaanapatiyinaal, En Pattayaththaiyaakilum, En Aayudhangalaiyaakilum, Naan Etuththuk Kontuvaravillai Endraan.

9 adharku Aasaariyan: Neer Ele Pallaththaakkile Kondra Pelisdhanaakiya Koliyaaththin Pattayam, Idho, Epoththukkup Pinnaaka Oru Putavaiyile Surutti Vaiththirukkiradhu; Adhai Neer Etukka Manadhaanaal Etuththukkontupom, Adhuve Allaamal Verondrum Illai Endraan; Appozhudhu Thaaveedhu: Adharku Nikarillai; Adhai Enakku Thaarum Endraan.
10 andraiyadhinam Thaaveedhu Ezhundhu Savulukkuth Thappiyoti, Kaaththin Raajaavaakiya Aakeesitaththil Ponaan.

11 aakeesin Oozhiyakkaarar Avanaip Paarththu: Thesaththu Raajaavaakiya Thaaveedhu Ivan Allavo? Savul Kondradhu Aayiram, Thaaveedhu Kondradhu Padhinaayiram Endru Ivanaikkuriththallavo Aatal Paatalote Kontaatinaarkal.
12 indha Vaarththaikalaith Thaaveedhu Than Manadhile Vaiththukkontu, Kaaththin Raajaavaakiya Aakeesukku Mikavum Payappattu,

13 avarkal Kankalukku Munpaakath Than Mukanaatiyai Verupatuththi, Avarkalitaththil Piththangontavanpolak Kaanpiththu, Vaasarkadhavukalile Keerikkontirundhu, Than Vaayilirundhu Nuraiyaith Than Thaatiyil Vizhappannik Kontirundhaan.
14 appozhudhu Aakees: Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Idho, Indha Manushan Piththangontavan Endru Kaankireerkale; Ivanai Neengal Ennitaththil Kontuvandhadhu Enna?
15 enakku Munpaakap Payiththiya Seshtai Seyya, Neengal Ivanaik Kontuvarukiradharku, Payiththiyakkaarar Enakkuk Kuraivaayirukkiraarkalo? Ivan En Veettile Varalaamaa Endraan.
